name: differ
description: The best diff viewer for working with AI

scripts.build:cli:
bun run build && mkdir -p dist/web && cp -r packages/web/dist dist/web/ && bun build packages/cli/src/index.ts --compile --outfile dist/differ && node -e "console.log('
✅ Built standalone binary: dist/differ

To install globally, run:

sudo ln -sf ' + process.cwd() + '/dist/differ /usr/local/bin/differ
')"
scripts.build:publish: bun run build && bun build packages/cli/src/index.ts --outdir publish/bin --target bun --external open && cp -r packages/web/dist publish/web && echo '✅ Ready to publish. Run: cd publish && npm publish'
